nodes.title: Add support for asynchronous service instance binding and unbinding
Add support for asynchronous service instance binding and unbinding
Adding metadata for api version check property
Making service_id and plan_id not required in last_operation
Add default constructors in models to support deserialization
Ignoring dashboard url and operation when empty
Eliminate use of deprecated HttpMessageNotReadableException constructor
Move all exception handling to a ControllerAdvice class.
Make plan_id not required for update operation
Remove generic exception handler to allow service specific handling.
Support externalized configuration for defining a service broker catalog
Add support for disabling API version checks via a config property
Gradle build for reference docs and initial TOC skeleton
Add default constructor to schema model objects
Add method attached JSON schemas on service plans
Remove `@ComponentScan` and add capability to configure a base path for the service broker.
Service Plan is free by default
Add the cause when mapping parameters fails
Enable Support foundation ID in service-broker routes to identify cloud foundry instance
Fix mismatched parameter for telling broker to run async
match the variable name to the parameter name to make more clear
Accept requests with any version of the broker API by default.
Return a 400 for a request with an empty body or mismatched content type
Updating pipeline to use GH token
Fixes gh-327: added Spring boot 2.5 compatibility
Support service_id and plan_id params when retrieving an instance or binding
Return HTTP 400 Bad Request for unknown instance in last operation
Make support for blocking and reactive stacks ever more explicit.
Return the operation string in the response body for operations in progress
Replace dependency management plugin with Gradle platform dependencies
Adds MaintenanceInfo to CSIReq, UPSIReq and PreviousValues
Return 410 when status of an operation on a missing instance/binding is retrieved
Update javadoc to better reflect the OSBA spec
Respond with HTTP 400 when create or update request params are invalid
Allow empty description in get last operation response
Restrict Operation strings to 10,000 characters in the response body
Add list of endpoints to create Service Binding response body
Support update requests for a Service Instance containing only contextual data
Produce correct JSON response for service definition metadata
Add `maintenance_info` field to Service Plan object
Add model object for ServiceMetadata and improve imageUrl support
Change service_id and plan_id attributes to required
Fix issues with Servlet API and Reactor dependencies
Change a response code to conform to the OSB API while fetching service bindings
Return 400 BadRequest when X-Broker-API-Version in a request is missing
Return a 400 status instead of 412 for API version checks
Change exceptions mapping to conform spec
Add support for binding get last operation
Change response codes to confrom to OSB API spec
Support auto-configuration of event flows via bean definitions
Add failure analysis for missing Catalog or ServiceInstanceService beans
Fix Json schema not mapping properly arrays.
Add support for custom base path of service broker controllers
Catalog with standard cloudfoundry plan meta data
Don't set default Boolean value for missing optional OSB fields
Catalog yml full schema test & doc
Filter Plan objects provided in Request objects
Fix Json serialization of model objects for use by OSB clients
Add service broker bad request exception to version 1.0.x
